update.description:
This pull request adds the infrastructure for managing the list of neighbors during communication:

* Allow a robot controller to request its local neighbors list using `this->Neighbors()`.
* A message is only delivered if the destination node is included among the sender's neighbors.

In the `Load()` method, the broker plugin parses the world SDF and creates a
map with information about all the members of the Swarm. In the
`Update()` function, the broker plugin updates the list of neighbors for each
member of the team. For now, this neighbors list contains all the swarm members. When
the broker plugin updates the list of neighbors of a given robot, it sends a
message to the `RobotPlugin` of that robot notifying the updated list.

The filtering of the messages happens in the `RobotPlugin` (at destination). When a message is received, the destination robot checks if its local address is included in the sender's neighbor list.

~~**Note:** This pull request is a branch of pull request #3. You can see the real diff [here](#!/osrf/swarm/branches/compare/neighbors%0Dmovement#diff).~~ (pull request #3 was merged)
update.title: Neighbors
